UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: The Role of Outer Membrane Proteins and Lipopolysaccharides for the Sensitivity of Escherichia coli to Antimicrobial Peptides
Literature.Author: Ebbensgaard A, Mordhorst H, Aarestrup FM, Hansen EB

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>=64µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 del-waaC(MIC=32µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 del-waaE(MIC=>=64µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 del-waaF(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 del-waaG(MIC=8µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium LT2(MIC=16-32µg/ml),Yersinia ruckeri 392/2003(MIC=32-64µg/ml)
